com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.download
Class DefaultDownloaderController

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.download.DefaultDownloaderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
DownloaderController
public class DefaultDownloaderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements DownloaderController

Default controller implementation. Provides generic downloader for all urls or custom downloader for specific domain.

Author:
ameshkov
